title: LuJoSoft MouseClicker V2
description:
LuJoSoft MouseClicker V2

Introduction
LuJoSoft MouseClicker V2 is a simple program that clicks your mouse automatically anywhere on the screen at variable interval. MouseClicker can be used to make repetitive clicking easy, but should not be used to cheat in online-games. You can use it to automate any application or to refresh your webpage

How to use:
Very simple,
1. You must select a time format you want to use:
Millisecond(s)
Second(s)
Minutes(s)

2. For every entry you will enter you can modify the amount of time of delay for each click in the numeric up and down control

3. Finally for every entry you will put in the list you can choose a different location for the clicking to occur just by pointing the cursor on the screen over where    you want it to click and then press one of the following key:
Press "l" for simulating left click.
Press "r" for simulating double click.
Press "d" for simulating right click.

There is a loop function so it can restart the cycle at the end of the completion of the list. Beware if loop is use in time format in millisecond it could be almost impossible to stop.

To cancel any process click on the cancel button or if the application is on top of the other use the Esc key
Also added the possibility to save your settings and reload them any time you want.

System requirement:
Window Xp, windows server, Vista, windows 7 and 8.1.
.Net framework 4.5.

Installation:
No installation require it's portable.
Double click MouseClicker.exe.
Then enjoy!
